## Active Clients

- Prefers async communication, responds quickly to Slack
- Has budget authority up to $100k without additional approval

- Nov 2025: Signed 12-week engagement
- Dec 2025: Extended scope to include security team

**Notes**:
- Birthday: March 15 (send note)
- Interested in speaking at conferences about AI adoption
- Potential reference customer after engagement
